answers.answer: Oh my gosh I'm so sorry the hospital is SO boring! At least your daughter is okay!!! Congrats on the girl! :)
Oh you go put your feet up and relax.. They suck, those infections.. Good luck

have you been checked for gd yet? (gestational diabetes ((sp?)  i bet you made a lot of people laught there butt off. sounds funny. at least you dont remember so there really isnt anything that you could get imbarriased about.
I know what you mean hon...... I have kidney stones all the time.. And labor is a breeze after that... lol

I heard the same thing about gallbladder stones. I had attacks that would last for like 8 hours at a clip. When I went in for emergency surgery to get my galbladder removed the nurse told me its more painful than labor!
Oh my......Good to hear you are doing good now. Take it Ez.......A GIRL how sweet..Congrats

question: last night... I went in aroun 8 in the evening and am just now getting home. I was having alot of pain in my lower abdomen so they hooked me up to the fetal heart monitor and I wasnt having any contractions (which is good) so then they did a urine and I had proteins in my urine and it turns out I have a UTI that spread to my kidneys which turned into a kidney infection so they gave me demerol through my iv and I slept most of the night away. In the morning they sent for an ultrasound and they confirmed that im having a little girl  which im going to name aubrey ryan :o) She was kicking and having a good ole time .. the nurses were all laughing at me cus I was loppy from the demerol... I guess I was trying to undress in the hall way lol.. I dont remember any of it though. they were a little worried about my blood pressure it was 172/105 when I went in which is horrible ... but I was in really bad pain so thats why it was so high... the ob told me if I can survive a kidney stone that labor is a breeze.. lol :o)
title: so I spent the night in labor & delivery.....
